Understate: The claim understates the fact that the Mumbai police has been paying respects to Hazrat Pir Mahim for several years on the occasion of Urs.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it only provides a video and social media posts as evidence, without any official statements or reports.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that it is the first time the Mumbai police is paying respects to Hazrat Pir Mahim under the Shiv Sena, without considering the previous instances when it was done under the BJP's rule.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the Mumbai police has been paying respects to Hazrat Pir Mahim regularly, regardless of the political party in power.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the significance of the Mumbai police paying respects to Hazrat Pir Mahim under the Shiv Sena, implying that it is a unique and unprecedented event, when it has been a regular practice in the past.
